<div class="treeview"><onlyinclude>
** {{nbt|int|Age}}: Represents the age of the mob in ticks; when negative, the mob is a baby. When 0 or above, the mob is an adult. When above 0, represents the number of ticks before this mob can breed again.
** {{nbt|int|ForcedAge}}: A value of age assigned to this mob when it grows up. Incremented when a baby mob is fed.
** {{nbt|int|InLove}}: Number of ticks until the mob loses its breeding hearts and stops searching for a mate. 0 when not searching for a mate.
** {{nbt|int-array|LoveCause}}: The [[UUID]] of the entity that caused this mob to breed, stored as four integers.
</onlyinclude></div><noinclude>
